Package game_code

Class descriptionMaker

java.lang.Object
game_code.descriptionMaker
public class descriptionMaker
extends java.lang.Object
A class that processes the raw information and turns that into descriptions/text that the player can read. The constructor takes a ship object so that you only need to pass it the ship once.
Author:
nzoli

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) Ship ship
    The ship that the descriptionMaker describes/describes aspects of
    (package private) GameStats statTracker
    The current status of the game being described.(time left, money left.etc)

  • Field Details

    • ship

      Ship ship
      The ship that the descriptionMaker describes/describes aspects of

    • statTracker

      GameStats statTracker
      The current status of the game being described.(time left, money left.etc)

  • Constructor Details

    • descriptionMaker

      public descriptionMaker​(Ship ship, GameStats stats)
      Constructor for the class. Takes a ship during construction so that other description methods don't need arguments. Takes a GameStats instance for the same reason.
      Parameters:
      ship - The ship that the descriptionMaker will describe/describe aspects of
      stats - GameStats The instance of GameStats that the game is using.

  • Method Details

    • describeMoney

      public java.lang.String describeMoney()
      Returns a string description of the player's financial status
      Returns:
      The money the player has. NOT followed by a newline.

    • describeTime

      public java.lang.String describeTime()
      Returns a string description of the remaining time left in the game.
      Returns:
      The time left in the game. NOT followed by a newline.

    • describeShip

      public java.lang.String describeShip()
      Returns a string description of the ship - not including cargo contents.
      Returns:
      A string version of the description, formatted with newlines.

    • describeEndurance

      public java.lang.String describeEndurance()
      Describes the physical state of the player's ship
      Returns:
      A string description of the current damage state of the ship

    • upgradeCollector

      private java.lang.String upgradeCollector()
      Private method for handling the upgrades part of describeShip. generally, should not be called by itself.
      Returns:
      A series of upgrades and their description, each followed by a newline character.

    • describeCargo

      public java.lang.String describeCargo()
      returns a String describing the state of the ship's cargo hold. If there is 0 of a good stored in the ship, its entry will be omitted. Each good summary is printed on a newline
      Returns:
      The string description of the cargo, formatted with newline characters.

    • describeSales

      public java.lang.String describeSales()
      Describes the sales the player has made over the course of the game
      Returns:
      A string version of a 'trade manifest', showing each good sold, quantity, where, and for how much

    • determineIsland

      public java.lang.String determineIsland​(Good good)
      Returns the island which the good was sold at Finish this when we have decided which goods are sold where. Just use a switch statement with good names.
      Parameters:
      good - The good being determined
      Returns:
      The name of the island which buys the good.

    • describeRoute

      public java.lang.String describeRoute​(Island island, Route route)
      Returns Where the route is leading to and the risk of triggering an event
      Parameters:
      island - The destination of the route
      route - The route to the destination Island
      Returns:
      The string version of the destination, time it takes, and the risk of triggering an event

    • describeIsland

      public java.lang.String describeIsland​(Island island)
      returns a string describing the goods sold on the island and the goods the island wants
      Parameters:
      island - The Island being described
      Returns:
      A String version of the name of the island.

    • describeSold

      public java.lang.String describeSold​(Island island)
      returns a string describing the goods sold on the island
      Parameters:
      island - The Island being described
      Returns:
      A String version of the goods available.

    • describeWant

      public java.lang.String describeWant​(Island island)
      returns a string describing the goods the island wants
      Parameters:
      island - The Island being described
      Returns:
      A String version of the goods wanted.
